m_szDocTitle: 200-Mile Electric Hyundai SUV Reportedly In The Works | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: 200-Mile Electric Hyundai SUV Reportedly In The Works May 8th, 2016 by James Ayre   Hyundai is planning to release an all-electric SUV with at least 200 miles of range by 2018, according to recent reports. The news — which originated with the Korea Herald — has seemingly been confirmed by an unnamed company rep, so it appears to have something solid to it. The confirmation didn’t reference a range, though, but rather simply that that company would be releasing “a new electric SUV” by 2018.
